content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for coming, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I am looking to rent it out for the highest possible price. What price range are you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you give me an idea of what the current market rate is for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, Hassan. I am currently looking for 1000 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim. This is based on current market rates in the area.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euro. Thank you.
TERMINATE.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I apologize, Hassan. I appreciate your interest, but I cannot accept the rental price of 900 Euros. My goal is to maximize my gains and I believe the current market rate of 1000 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim is a fair reflection of the value of the apartment. I hope you understand.
name: Heinrich Heine
